title: Cleric
content: Disadvantage on Perception Checks. 10 Turns On save: Targets still take half damage. 18m CON Save Concentration MASS CURE WOUNDS Lv 5 Evocation Action 6-7 Healing 3d8+3Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m PLANAR BINDING Lv 5 Abjuration Action Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally. 10 Turns Target must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fien
